text: Ernesto Teodoro Moneta was an Italian journalist and soldier. He later became a pacifist and won the 1907 Nobel Peace Prize. Moneto was born in Milan on September 20, 1833. He died February 10, 1918. Category:1833 births Category:1918 deaths Category:Nobel Peace Prize winners Category:Italian journalists Category:Writers from Milan Category:Italian Nobel Prize winners
title: Ernesto Teodoro Moneta
